{"body": {"name": "DevHub Design Contributions report April 1 - April 30, 2024", "summary": "DevHub Design Contributions report April 1 - April 30, 2024", "category": "Engagement & Awareness", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "orangejoe.near", "description": "**Breakdown + deliverables:**\\\\nDevHub community covers + avatars \\\\u{2014} 5 hours\\\\nDevHub Calls covers + animation \\\\u{2014} 5 hours\\\\nDevHub News continued \\\\u{2014} 8 hours\\\\nHomepage revamp v1 \\\\u{2014} 30 hours\\\\nEthCC prep: swag list, brand treatment concept \\\\u{2014} 10 hours\\\\nDevHub platform redesign continued: research, wireframes, design options, revisions \\\\u{2014} 92 hours\\\\nDevHub Live sub-branding \\\\u{2014} 10 hours\\\\nEvents committee logo \\\\u{2014} 2 hours\\\\nCalls: Joe, Jose, Marketing, Events, Pagoda/DevHub \\\\u{2014} 8 hours\\\\n\\\\n**Total hours: 170 hours\\\\nHourly rate: $55\\\\nService fee: $9350**", "linked_proposals": [55], "receiver_account": "sashapais.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "9350", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDT"}, "labels": []}

{"body": {"name": "DevHub Developer Relations Contributor report [06-05-2024 to 17-05-2024]", "summary": "Developing DevHub Developer News | Managing WG\\\\\\'s | Community Pages", "category": "Decentralized DevRel", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "bpolania.near", "description": "### Summary \\\\n\\\\n\\\\u{1f468}\\\\u{200d}\\\\u{1f4bb} Mon 6th May 2024 - Fri 10th May 2024\\\\n\\\\n1. Preparing WG for upcoming NEP Call  **7H**\\\\n\\\\n3. Working on Analytics spreadsheet - **2H**\\\\n\\\\n4. NEAR Dev NEWS: Compiling content for the newsletter...involving going through all DevHub Communities Telegram channels to filter relevant updates, sourcing additional technical updates from external channels, error checking, editing ,compiling and taking notes of improvements. **34H**\\\\n\\\\n2. Collecting data for the DevRel metrics spreadsheet **1H**\\\\n\\\\n6. {"body": {"name": "Owen DevRel Contributor Report 13 May - 26 May", "summary": "Bi-weekly paid developer relations contributor report. The aim of these activities is to onboard more developers to the ecosystem, and assist existing developers with problems or enrich their experience in the ecosystem. Activities for the last two weeks can be seen below.", "category": "Decentralized DevRel", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "bpolania.near", "description": "## Timeline\\\\nStart Date: May 13, 2024\\\\n\\\\nEnd Date: May 26, 2024\\\\n\\\\u{200b}\\\\n## Requested Funding\\\\nHours: 28:55\\\\n\\\\nRate: $50/hour \\\\n\\\\nTotal Amount: $1446\\\\n\\\\n# Summary of Activities\\\\n\\\\n### Developer and community support \\\\n- 4:40 Supporting developers and interacting with communities through Discord and Telegram\\\\n\\\\n## Content \\\\n- 6:00 near-api-js video tutorial setup, production and editing + getting used to new editing software\\\\n- 5:30 Working on multichain account swap example, [doc](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1oAJHArS1wCAetGDEl-KCSTdnMenTaoe7J4-7ybQ0Xrs/edit#heading=h.kkxnl1etcgwo), [repo](https://github.com/PiVortex/multichain-account-swap).\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n### Events\\\\n- 3:00 Remote ETH Berlin developer support \\\\n\\\\n### Technical Communities\\\\n- 0:10 ZK community moderation\\\\n- 1:00 Prep for Chain Abstraction Community Call #2\\\\n\\\\n### General / Other \\\\n- 3:30 DevRel team calls\\\\n- 0:30 Testing infrastructure committee portal\\\\n- 3:30 Setting KPIs and internal roadmap admin\\\\n- 1:05 Misc activities, includes assisting DevRel team and odd jobs such as proof reading", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "icespice.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1446", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": []}
